# cojam

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/simisc/cojam.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/simisc/cojam)

Multi-variant colocalisation with summary genetic association data. Merge [R2BGLiMS](https://github.com/pjnewcombe/R2BGLiMS "R2BGLiMS")`::JAM()` results for two distinct traits, for posterior inference about shared genetic variants associated with both traits.

## Installation

You can install cojam from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("simisc/cojam")
```
